trends: There have been no other sightings in Bruner
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi left the house to go to the store. noticed the house on the hill across a river valley had a fire outside. not unusual but it drew my attention to our hill field across the finely river. above it was the ufo. it was flashing white and colored lights of whit, green\blue, and red. at first i though might be plane, then it suddenly dropped what would have been 100 feet at the distant i was observing it from. it then did few more zig zags rising and falling. at this point i ran back to the house and called my husband. he came outside and observed the same sort of behavior as me. it was then we noticed pail beams of light shooting off it. some projecting toward the ground some outward up toward the sky. they came on and off at random patterns and angles from different location on the faint dark object. the shape was not light but you could make out a roundish form the lights were attached too. my and my husbands feelings were astonished, and bit creeped out. he had never seen a ufo before i did once not far from here actually when i was a teenager. my sighting back then was reported, and very similar to this one. by this time a few minutes at the most it was starting to fade because while it was zigging and zagging it was also moving away from us. after 3 to 4 minutes it faded totally from view. we both went inside, i canceled my trip to the store and we came here to log our sighting. while i marked us as wanting to remain anonymous we would be will to talk further to mufon if they have more questions or if they have any other witness to corroborated our sighting.
